ygData.subject: Re: petition for a better wizard
ygData.msgSnippet: If you put this in there change it, do not refer to a damage shield as a Buff . Calling it a buff is bringing the Wizards closer to the other classes. Matter
ygData.messageBody:
If you put this in there change it, do not refer to a damage shield as a
"Buff". Calling it a buff is bringing the Wizards closer to the other
classes. Matter of fact I don't think this line of spells should confer ANY
buff properties. It should merely cause damage to an attacking MOB and not
provide any protection etc....


Cinius Shade of the 6th circle(Mith Marr)



> 4) O'Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the beginning of a great
> line of spells. Why should it end there? Cold and Magic based
> buffs/shields would be a very welcome addition.




_______________________________________________________
